SongLyrics.JpnStr: 踏[ふ]みつけられた孤独[こどく]とペダルから
SongLyrics.EngStr: From the loneliness I've trampled on and the pedals,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何度[なんど]も鳴[な]り響[ひび]く音色[ねいろ]が頬[ほほ]に伝[つた]う
SongLyrics.EngStr: Sounds that resound countless times reach my cheeks.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 打[う]ちつけられた孤独[こどく]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the loneliness I've struck,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: スネアのリズムが重[かさ]なって
SongLyrics.EngStr: The snare's rhythm gets heavy,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 確[たしか]かな鼓動[こどう]に成[な]る
SongLyrics.EngStr: Becoming a firm heartbeat.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]か心[こころ]のノイズをとって
SongLyrics.EngStr: Someone, take away the noise in my heart,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 私[わたし]を覗[のぞ]いてよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: And peek inside me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]だれも心[こころ]の奥[おく]には入[はい]れないけれど
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even though no one can enter the depths of my heart,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 期待[きたい]してしまう そんな夜[よる]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I end up hoping for such a night.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: Distortion it's Motion
始[はじ]まったらもう止[と]まらない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Once it begins, it won't stop anymore.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 命題[めいだい]も声帯[せいたい]で震[ふる]わせられるさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even propositions can be made to vibrate with the vocal cords.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そうだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Isn't that right?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ディスコード 何時[いつ]もそう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Discord, always like that.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 交[まじ]わらないその心[こころ]を繋[つな]ぎたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to connect those hearts that don't intertwine.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 端[はじ]っこでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if it's just the edge.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 投[な]げつけられた言葉[ことば]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: The words that were thrown at me,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何時[いつ]までもなんだか消[き]えないまま
SongLyrics.EngStr: Somehow, they never really disappear.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夕暮[ゆうぐ]れの影[かげ]みたいに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like the shadows of dusk,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 追[お]いかけられて 止[と]まれば飲[の]み込[こ]まれそうで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Chasing me, if I stop, it feels like I'll be swallowed.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 必死[ひっし]で走[はし]って また夜[よる]を待[ま]つんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I run desperately, waiting for the night again.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: Distortion it's Motion
始[はじ]まったらもう怖[こわ]くない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Once it begins, I'm not afraid anymore.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 騒音[そうおん]と轟音[ごうおん]で忘[わす]れられるから
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can forget with noise and roaring sounds.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そうだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Isn't that right?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ディスボード 電源[でんげん]を繋[つな]ぐ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Connecting the power source, just like the stars' light.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 私[わたし]だけの音[おと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: My own sound.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ギターの弦[げん]が揺[ゆ]れるたび
SongLyrics.EngStr: Every time the guitar strings vibrate,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 揺[ゆ]るがないものに変[かわ]ってゆく
SongLyrics.EngStr: They transform into something unshakable.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 指先[ゆびさき]が硬[かた]く成[な]るたび 此[こ]の意志[いし]も硬[かた]く成[な]るの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Every time my fingertips harden, this determination becomes firm.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ディストーションの音色[ねいろ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The sound of distortion,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: これっぽっちじゃまだ終[お]わらない
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's not over with just this much.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 最前[さいぜん]でハイゲインを受[う]け止[と]めてみてよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Try to catch the high gain right at the forefront.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今夜[こんや]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Tonight as well.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: Distortion it's Motion
始[はじ]まったらもう止[と]まらない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Once it begins, it won't stop anymore.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 制限[せいげん]も経験[けいけん]で塗[ぬ]り替[か]えられるさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even limitations can be changed through experience.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そうだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Isn't that right?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ディストーション 何時[いつ]もそう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Distortion, always like that.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 左[さ]脳[のう]追[お]い越[こ]して心[こころ]が走[はし]り出[だ]す
SongLyrics.EngStr: The heart races ahead of the left brain.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の方[ほう]へと
SongLyrics.EngStr: Toward you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 次[つぎ]の音[おと]にエスコート
SongLyrics.EngStr: Escorting to the next sound,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 日[ひ]々[び]の憂[うれ]いにディストーション
SongLyrics.EngStr: Distortion in the daily worries,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 一[ひと]人[り]の夜[よる] 鳴[な]らすコード
SongLyrics.EngStr: A lonely night, the chords resound.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]も同[おな]じかい?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Are you the same?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 理[り]想[そう]像[ぞう] 追[お]いかけた日[ひ]々[び]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The days we chased after our ideal images,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: Fコード 掻[か]き鳴[な]らすんだディストーション
SongLyrics.EngStr: The distortion that rings out the F chords,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ボリュームを振[ふ]り切[き]るよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll crank up the volume.
